isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 3200, 4100, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500, 8600 Models Built After 05/19/2003 - CHASSIS FEATURES - AIR DRYER AND HEATED DRAIN VALVE

svcsubsec.title: AIR DRYER AND HEATED DRAIN VALVE

svcproc.title: CIRCUIT FUNCTIONS

figure.caption: Air Dryer And Heated Drain Valve Function Diagram

svcproc.para: Refer to the Air Dryer And Heated Drain Valve Function Diagram.

The function of the air dryer is to collect moisture and contaminants before air reaches the first reservoir, thus providing moisture free air for the air brake system. The heater in the air dryer prevents freeze-up in the purge drain valve during cold weather operation.

The function of the automatic drain valve is to automatically expel accumulated moisture from the air tank. The heater in the drain valve prevents freeze-up in the purge drain valve during cold weather operation.
